original_text: When Gehazi reached a hill near Elisha's house, he took the things from the servants. He put them in his own room. He told the servants to go back to Naaman.
korean_text: 언덕에 이르러서는 게하시가 그 물건을 두 사환의 손에서 받아 집에 감추고 그들을 보내 가게 한 후

sentences.original_text: When Gehazi reached a hill near Elisha's house
sentences.korean_translation: 게하시가 엘리사의 집 근처 언덕에 이르렀을 때

sentences.original_text: he took the things from the servants
He put them in his own room
He told the servants to go back to Naaman
